work.name: Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory
work.summary: Design of mold for the fabrication of scintillating PTFE material, dark box components for use in testing scintillating PTFE material, and vertical circuit to modify the electromagnetic field in the detector

work.name: Tarana Wireless
work.position: Electronics Lab Design and Implementation Intern
work.summary: Designed floor plans for three new telecommunication equipment labs and a new rack and lab bench configuration for the new labs. Fulfilled IT requests for RF laboratory installation and maintenance

volunteer.organization: Women and Gender Minorities in Mechanical Engineering

awards.title: Rackham Merit Fellowship
awards.summary: The RMF is a funding partnership between Rackham and the graduate program that includes tuition, stipend, health, and dental coverage, during each fall and winter semester, with select summer stipend and benefits.

awards.title: McNair Scholarship
awards.summary: Received funding for my work at LBNL, gave a presentation at the McNair 2022 Symposium at UCLA, and will be published in The Berkeley McNair Research Journal

awards.title: ME Scholar
awards.summary: Hand-picked group of incoming MechE students at UC Berkeley chosen by the MechE counselor for a weekly seminar involving a stipend, research presentations by faculty, and career/academic planning

awards.title: NSF S-STEM Scholar
awards.summary: SPECS Scholarship Program supports academically talented, financially disadvantaged students from groups that are traditionally underrepresented in engineering professions: minorities, women, and first-generation students

references.name: Professor Elliott Rouse
references.position: Associate Professor of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor.

references.name: Professor Hannah Stuart
references.position: Associate Professor of Mechanical Engineering at the University of California, Berkeley.

references.name: Dr. Peter Sorensen
references.position: Senior Scientist at Lawrence Berkeley Labs in the Physics Division.

other work.name: Berkeley Student Cooperative
other work.summary: Managed food ordering, kitchen cleanliness, and workshifts for a kitchen serving 50 people.

other work.name: Gabrialla Cafe
other work.summary: Worked under the head pastry chef at Gabriella Cafe, helping with preparing deserts and occasionally doing prep for the other chefs.
